\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{z-eves}   % oz or z-eves or fuzz styles
\newenvironment{machine}[1]{
    \begin{tabular}{@{\qquad}l}\textbf{\kern-1em machine}\ #1\\ }{
    \\ \textbf{\kern-1em end} \end{tabular} }


\begin{document}


\begin{zed}
 [DNI] 
\end{zed}


\begin{zed}
  DINERO == \num
\end{zed}


\begin{zed}
  EDAD == \nat
\end{zed}


\begin{zed} 
    MENS ::= ok | error1 | error2
\end{zed}


\begin{zed}
  EQUIPO == \power DNI
\end{zed}


\begin{zed}
  FUN == \nat \rel \nat
\end{zed}

\end{document}
